mapper.select: select sku_id, group_concat(sale_attr_value_id order by sav.sale_attr_value_id asc separator '|') value_ids from sku_sale_attr_value sav inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssa on ssa.id = sav.sale_attr_value_id and ssa.is_deleted = 0 and sav.is_deleted = 0 where ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} group by sku_id
